title: The World of Anne Frank
description: This is a unique and powerful photographic history which documents the life and times of Anne Frank against a backdrop of war - but which also shows the continuing dangers of racism in today's world. Packed with photographs from the Frank family's albums, the archives of the Anne Frank House and news agencies throughout Europe, "The World of Anne Frank" is an essential companion for anyone who has ever read and loved "The Diary of Anne Frank".
author: Anne Frank Foundation
